2823.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_IN_APPLICATION_TEMPORARILY
2823.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2823.short_description: Your PNID is temporarily banned from this application
2823.long_description: The account you are trying to use has been temporarily banned from this application for breaking the rules.
2823.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire
2823.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire or appeal it on the forum.
